                        int wx,
                        int y,
                        int wy)
        Is this point not inside the bounds of the game world?.
        Parameters:
        x - - X coordinate of point to be checked
        wx - - X coordinate of world point reference
        y - - Y coordinate of point to be checked
        wy - - Y coordinate of world point reference
        Returns:
